api_name: Formula One API: List of all drivers
functionality:
To obtain a list of all drivers.

Driver lists can be refined by adding one or more of the following criteria:

/circuits/<circuitId>
/constructors/<constructorId>
/drivers/<driverId>
/grid/<position>
/results/<position>
/fastest/<rank>
/status/<statusId>

For

api_name: Formula One API: List of all drivers within a year
functionality: This endpoint is to obtain a list of all drivers in a particular season (year)

api_name: Formula One API: List of all drivers within a race in a year
functionality: This endpoint is to obtain a list of all drivers in a particular race(round) of a season(year)

api_name: Formula One API: Driver Information
functionality: Each driver listed in the response is identified by a unique driverId which is used to identify the driver throughout

api_name: Formula One API: List of all constructors
functionality:
This endpoint is to obtain a list of all constructors.

Constructor lists can be refined by adding one or more of

api_name: Formula One API: List of all constructors within a year
functionality: This endpoint is to obtain a list of all constructors in a particular season (year)

api_name: Formula One API: List of all constructors within a race in a year
functionality: This endpoint is to obtain a list of all constructors in a particular race(round) of a season(year)

api_name: Formula One API: Constructor Information
functionality: Each constructor listed in the response is identified by a unique constructorId which is used to identify the constructor throughout

api_name: Formula One API: List of all circuits
functionality:
This endpoint is to obtain a list of all constructors.


Circuit lists can be refined by adding one or more of

api_name: Formula One API: List of all circuits within a year
functionality: NO DESC IN POSTMAN

api_name: Formula One API: List of all circuits within a race in a year
functionality: NO DESC IN POSTMAN

api_name: Formula One API: Circuit Information
functionality: Each constructor listed in the response is identified by a unique circuitId which is used to identify the constructor throughout

api_name: Formula One API: Seasons List
functionality:
This endpoint gives the seasons currently supported by the API.


Season lists can be refined by adding one or more of

api_name: Formula One API: Race Result
functionality:
This endpoint gives the result for a specific race (round) in a season(year).


If the results for the specified race are

api_name: Formula One API: Most recent race result
functionality: Results from the most recent race can be obtained using this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: Qualifying Results
functionality: NO DESC IN POSTMAN

api_name: Formula One API: Schedule of races for a season
functionality: To obtain the schedule of races for a specific season use this endpoint required season (year).

api_name: Formula One API: Schedule of the current season
functionality: To obtain the schedule of races for the current season, use this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: Info about a specific race
functionality: To obtain the schedule of races for a specific race(round) in a season(year), use this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: Driver standings after a race
functionality: To fetch the driver standings after a specific race(round) in a season(year), use this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: Constructor standings after a race
functionality: To list the constructor standings after a specific race (round) in a season(year), use this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: Season end driver standings
functionality: Driver Standings at the end of the season(year).

api_name: Formula One API: Season end constructor standing
functionality: Constructor Standings at the end of the season(year).

api_name: Formula One API: Current drivers' standing
functionality: Current driver standings can always be obtained using this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: Current constructor's standing
functionality: Current constructor standings can always be obtained using this endpoint.

api_name: Formula One API: All winners of drivers' championships
functionality: To fetch all the winners information of drivers.

api_name: Formula One API: All winners of constructors' championships
functionality: To fetch all the winners information of constructors.

api_name: Formula One API: Driver standings by specifying the driver
functionality: Driver standings by giving in the driverid(name of the driver).

api_name: Formula One API: Constructor standings by specifying the constructor
functionality: Constructor standings by giving in the constructorid(name of the constructor).

api_name: Formula One API: List of all finishing status codes
functionality: Every driver has a finishing status like 'finished', disqualified', 'accident', '+1 lap', '+2 lap', etc. This endpoint will give the

api_name: Formula One API: List of finishing status for a specific season
functionality: To fetch the list of finishing status of a specific season(year).

api_name: Formula One API: List of finishing status for a specific round in a season
functionality: To fetch the list of finishing status of a specific race(round) in a season(year).

api_name: Formula One API: Lap time
functionality: This endpoint requires the season(year), race(round) and lap number(lapnumber) to be specified.

api_name: Formula One API: Pit stop data for a race
functionality: This endpoint requires the season(year) and race(round) to be specified.

api_name: Formula One API: Information for a specific pit stop
functionality: This endpoint requires the season(year), race(round) and pit stop number(pitstopnumber) to be specified.
